package.name: Brainvire_Orders_Delete
package.summary: Brainvire order delete extension helps to delete orders from magento admin those created while development or testing.
package.description:
Brainvire's Order Delete Extension appears on a admin panel action dropdown.

In Magento, you can't delete orders. This extension allows to delete selected orders

Installation Steps

1. Disable Magento Compilation from System->Tools->Compilation and Flush Magento Cache from System->Cache Management > Click button Flush Magneto Cache 2. Install the extension through Magneto Connect. 3. Go to System > Cache Management > Click button Flush Magneto Cache. 4. Logout out and re-login.
  1. Step 1: Disable Magento Compilation from System->Tools->Compilation and Flush Magento Cache from System->Cache Management > Click button Flush Magneto Cache
  2. Step 2: Install the extension through Magneto Connect
  3. Step 3: Go to System > Cache Management > Click button Flush Magneto Cache
  4. Step 4: Logout out and re-login

That's it! You'll be all set to delete order from magento admin panel!

Warning: It's preferable to delete only the testing orders during the development of your local website.You take risks if you delete Orders directly in your Website.

Feature List

  • Allow to delete selected mutliple orders from magento admin panel
package.notes: Brainvire Order Delete Extension Release V1.0.1
